name: Coward Crouch
notes:
Hold down on the stick during the move to continue the technique for 48 more frames
During the crouch, press up on the stick to cancel the technique
Can transition to Surprise Forward Hop or Surprise Backward Hop from frames 18 - 111 (longest time)

Disappears 1000 frames after landing on the ground
Works as a projectile attack when activated by any special moves that produces electricity or comes in contact with a Super Art until the 1000th frame
The trajectory of the thrown doll changes if it touches the edge of the screen

name:
Rolling Cannon

(During Lightning Beast)(When performing a rolling-type special move, press any direction)
recovery: 9 frames of recovery upon landing
notes: Can transition into any Rolling-style attack a maximum of 3 times

name: SA1 Shout of Earth
notes:
Invincible to strikes and throws from frames 1 - 9
Minimum guaranteed damage is set to 30%
Values do not change on counter or Punish Counter

name: [Lightning Beast] SA1 Shout of Earth
notes:
Invincible to strikes and throws from frames 1 - 9
Minimum guaranteed damage is set to 30%
Values do not change on counter or Punish Counter

name: SA2 Lightning Beast
notes:
Super Art 2 timer is set to 1500
Changes the properties of special moves except for Wild Hunt while active
Allows any Rolling-type attack to cancel into Rolling Cannon while active
Allows the following attacks to be cancel into without any directional charge
- Rolling Attack
- Vertical Rolling Attack
- Aerial Rolling Attack

name: SA3 Ground Shave Cannonball
notes:
Completely invincible from frames 1 - 12
Considered airborne from frames 2 - 12
Minimum guaranteed damage is set to 50%
Values do not change on counter or Punish Counter
* Can only be canceled into from special moves

name:
CA Ground Shave Cannonball

(when under 25% vitality)
notes:
Completely invincible from frames 1 - 12
Considered airborne from frames 2 - 12
Minimum guaranteed damage is set to 50%
Values do not change on counter or Punish Counter
* Can only be canceled into from special moves

Backward Dash

name:
Drive Impact: Wild Scratch

HH
notes:
Super Armor for 2 hits from frames 1 - 27
Produces a wall splat if the pushback on hit causes the opponent to connect with the stage wall
Properties change to the following when the attack lands as a Punish Counter, or after the Super Armor absorbs a hit:
- Produces a crumple stun if the opponent is standing on the ground
- Forces a spinning knockdown when hitting a mid-air opponent
- Super Art gauge increases by 3000

name:
Drive Reversal (while blocking): Quick Rolling Attack

(When blocking or during a successful Drive Parry) HH
notes:
Recoverable damage
Completely invincible on frames 1 - 22
5 frames of recovery added on hit

name:
Drive Reversal (while recovering): Quick Rolling Attack

(During knockdown recovery) HH
notes:
Recoverable damage
Completely invincible on frames 1 - 20
5 frames of recovery added on hit

name:
Drive Parry

MM
notes:
*1 Can be canceled from the 4th frame via Drive Rush
*2 Parry hitbox is extended for as long as the buttons are held
Only blocks can be performed during the recovery period
Always in Punish Counter state during execution.

name:
Perfect Parry (strike)

Block Direction MM
notes:
Perfect Parry activates when an attack is absorbed on the frame a parry is input, or on the next frame. (For high and overhead attacks, the player must press the direction away from the opponent. For low attacks, down and back)
If no direction is inputted the result will be a regular parry with an additional Drive increase of 3000.
Fully invincible for 5 frames once recovery is over (invincibility not granted if you continue the parry)
The player on the receiving end of a Perfect Parry cannot cancel and is forced into a Punish Counter state until their move is finished

name:
Perfect Parry (projectile)

MM
notes:
Perfect Parry activates when an attack is absorbed on the frame a parry is input, or on the next frame
No screen freeze occurs.
The player on the receiving end of a Perfect Parry cannot cancel and is forced into a Punish Counter state until their move is finished

name:
Parry Drive Rush

(During a Drive Parry)
notes:
Screen freeze occurs until the 10th frame
* Can be canceled into an attack on the 9th frame of the move
Can be canceled into actions other than a parry from the 24th frame

name:
Cancel Drive Rush

(While connecting with a special-cancelable move) ( ) MM
notes:
Screen freeze occurs until the 9th frame
* Can be canceled into an attack from the 10th frame of the move
Can be canceled into actions other than a parry from the 25th frame
